channel.title: Picking up an entire row of books
channel.description: [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img59/5969/2012091400002.jpg[/img] This is pretty weird, and I'm pretty sure you shouldn't be able to pick it up. Map is bm_c1a2b, position -613.537842 979.820068 352.029358.

item.title: Picking up an entire row of books
item.dc:creator: fgsfds
item.description:
Well, you really don’t need to do calculations for a crapload of books when they’re static, so it breaks up into gibs (books) when a force is applied to it, because the most likely interaction with these books is, well, shooting them.

Read full topic
item.source: Picking up an entire row of books

item.title: Picking up an entire row of books
item.dc:creator: jessiestorm88
item.description:
Yeah I found one of those two in the labs in Questionable Ethics. You can throw it on the ground and it will break up into all of the separate books. It does look weird though.

Read full topic
item.source: Picking up an entire row of books
